item.title: acceptFromTicket
item.description: SoftLayer_Product_Item_Policy_Assignment::acceptFromTicket Register acceptance of this assignment linking this record to a Ticket. Overview Register the acceptance of the associated policy to product assignment, and link the created record to a Ticket. Parameters Name Type Description ticketId integer Required Headers authenticate SoftLayer_Product_Item_Policy_AssignmentInitParameters Return Values boolean
